video.title: Phineas and Ferb
video.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb invent, scheme and stay one step ahead of their bratty sister. Meanwhile, their pet platypus plots against evil Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb build the coolest rollercoaster ever in their own backyard. / On Candace's birthday, the family takes a trip to Mount Rushmore.
episodes.title: Rollercoaster / Candace Loses Her Head

episodes.synopsis: The boys convert Mom's car into a giant remote-controlled car. / Phineas and Ferb decide to make a tropical beach paradise in their very own backyard.
episodes.title: The Fast and the Phineas / Lawn Gnome Beach Party of Terror!

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb wrangle a stampede of cattle through the city streets. / The boys create a mountain of snow in the middle of summer!
episodes.title: The Magnificent Few / S'Winter

episodes.synopsis: In an old theater, Phineas and Ferb search for a mummy to call their own. / Phineas and Ferb conspire to become one-hit wonders.
episodes.title: Are You My Mummy? / Flop Starz

episodes.synopsis: Phineas is challenged by Buford to an all-out thumb war. / Candace has an opportunity to become a glamorous movie star!
episodes.title: Raging Bully / Lights, Candace, Action!

episodes.synopsis: At their grandparents' mountain cabin, Phineas and Ferb organize a day of summer camp activities. / Phineas and Ferb build a monstrous tree house.
episodes.title: Get That Bigfoot Outta My Face! / Tree to Get Ready

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb fix an unfinished time machine and take Candace along on an adventure that brings them face to face with a Tyrannosaurus Rex.
episodes.title: It's About Time!: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb make their own circus when the real circus performance is canceled. / Phineas and Ferb invent a new Perry the Platypus toy.
episodes.title: Jerk De Soleil / Toy to the World

episodes.synopsis: When Isabella gets an extreme case of hiccups, the boys attempt to scare them out of her by creating a haunted house full of shocking surprises.
episodes.title: One Good Scare Ought to Do It!: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb recreate a medieval tournament in England. / Phineas and Ferbs create an army of robot clones to get all their projects done.
episodes.title: Hard Day's Knight / I, Brobot

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb throw a big birthday bash for their mom. / Phineas and Ferb are accidentally transported by their minisub into Candace's body.
episodes.title: Mom's Birthday / Journey to the Center of Candace

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb's new fashion line destroys Candace's chances at supermodel stardom. / Phineas and Ferb attempt to build an ice cream sundae machine.
episodes.title: Run Away Runway / I Scream, You Scream

episodes.synopsis: Candace has trouble learning to parallel park, so Phineas and Ferb build her a monster truck. / Grandpa Clyde sings about a pirate called Badbeard.
episodes.title: It's a Mud, Mud, Mud, Mud World / The Ballad of Badbeard

episodes.synopsis: Phineas, Ferb and Candace decide to get their mom and dad's favorite band, Love Händel, back together for a reunion concert in their backyard.
episodes.title: Dude, We're Gettin' the Band Back Together!: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Candace and Stacy win a chance to spend time with their favorite band, the Bettys. / Phineas and Ferb help Grandpa Fletcher become a daredevil.
episodes.title: Ready for the Bettys / The Flying Fishmonger

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb are shipped off to military school when Candace reveals to the boys' mom what they've been up to.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb Get Busted!: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb re-create an ancient Greek chariot race. / Candace enlists a reality show to help her bust Phineas and Ferb.
episodes.title: Greece Lightning / Leave the Busting to Us!

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb set up a roller derby rink for Grandma Betty Jo. / It's such a nice day that Phineas and Ferb decide to do nothing.
episodes.title: Crack That Whip / The Best Lazy Day Ever

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb uncover a caveman at an archeological dig. / Phineas and Ferb set out to find Buford's missing goldfish.
episodes.title: Boyfriend from 27,000 B.C. / Voyage to the Bottom of Buford

episodes.synopsis: While Candace is sick in bed, she asks Stacy to monitor Phineas and Ferb. / Phineas and Ferb's body transporter actually works on Candace and Perry.
episodes.title: Does This Duckbill Make Me Look Fat? / Put That Putter Away

episodes.synopsis: Candace discovers a camera with hours of evidence against Phineas and Ferb. / Phineas and Ferb decide to build the world's largest bowling ball.
episodes.title: Traffic Cam Caper / Bowl-R-Rama Drama

episodes.synopsis: Grandma and Grandpa Fletcher tell the boys about their great, great ancestor who built a monster. / Phineas and Ferb help an artist showcase his art.
episodes.title: The Monster of Phineas-n-Ferbenstein / Oil on Candace

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb help Baljeet with his science fair project -- a portal to Mars! / Candace travels through Baljeet's portal to Mars.
episodes.title: Unfair Science Fair / Unfair Science Fair Redux

episodes.synopsis: After Mom and Dad have a star named after Phineas and Ferb, the boys decide to travel by rocket to get a better look at it.
episodes.title: Out to Launch: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Isabella challenges Buford to a sports contest. / Candace reluctantly agrees to go to the park with Jeremy and Suzy.
episodes.title: Got Game? / Comet Kermilian

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb appear as cartoon superheroes. / When his brother is elected governor, Dr. Doofenshmirtz decides to start his own country.
episodes.title: Out of Toon / Hail Doofania!

episodes.synopsis: The family goes camping on a lake, where Candace wreaks havoc among vacationers by spotting a strange creature in the water.
episodes.title: The Lake Nose Monster: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: The boys wonder what Perry is really saying when he makes his little noises. / Phineas and Ferb raise "aglet" awareness.
episodes.title: Interview with a Platypus / Tip of the Day

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb help Baljeet win a vegetable-growing contest with phineasandferbalizer. / Phineas and Ferb build an aquarium in the backyard.
episodes.title: Attack of the 50-Foot Sister / Backyard Aquarium

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb fill up Isabella's swimming pool with gelatin. / Phineas and Ferb's grandparents introduce the boys to Sherlock Holmes stories.
episodes.title: Day of the Living Gelatin! / Elementary, My Dear Stacy

episodes.synopsis: Candace decides to find out where the boys' inventions go every day. / Phineas and Ferb create the chicest platypus-themed restaurant in Danville.
episodes.title: Don't Even Blink / Chez Platypus

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb believe that a fallen bird egg came from Perry. / Phineas and Ferb create their own video game selection.
episodes.title: Perry Lays an Egg / Gaming the System

episodes.synopsis: While playing with a new baseball pitching gadget, Phineas and Ferb accidentally knock an alien craft out of the sky and into their backyard.
episodes.title: The Chronicles of Meap: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Relatives of the next-door neighbors bear a resemblance to Candace and the boys. / The boys set out to build a plane bigger than the Spruce Goose.
episodes.title: Thaddeus and Thor / De Plane! De Plane!

episodes.synopsis: Candace worries that Jeremy will leave her behind. / Phineas and Ferb decide to help Isabella, and the Fireside Girls meet their fund-raising goals.
episodes.title: Let's Take a Quiz / At the Car Wash

episodes.synopsis: Perry is assigned to take down a dangerous villain. / The Flynn family becomes shipwrecked on a tropical island.
episodes.title: Oh, There You Are, Perry / Swiss Family Phineas

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb shrink everyone down to play hide-and-seek indoors. / Phineas and Ferb create a romantic cruise line for Baljeet and a girl he likes.
episodes.title: Hide and Seek / That Sinking Feeling

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb help Baljeet prepare to headline a rock concert. / Baljeet sends Vanessa after an item that Doofenshmirtz needs.
episodes.title: The Baljeatles / Vanessassary Roughness

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb set out to create working X-ray glasses. / Candace and Stacy's spa day plans inspire Phineas and Ferb to create their own spa.
episodes.title: No More Bunny Business / Spa Day

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb use a time machine in the museum to head 20 years into the future!
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb's Quantum Boogaloo: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Monogram and Doofenshmirtz host a music video countdown!
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb's Musical Cliptastic Countdown

episodes.synopsis: Baljeet rides in a giant bubble. / Isabella and the Fireside Girls go on a quest to obtain a key ingredient for Phineas and Ferb's bubble solution.
episodes.title: Bubble Boys / Isabella and the Temple of Sap

episodes.synopsis: Candace jumps to conclusions when Jeremy breaks a date with her. / Candace tries to become a Fireside Girl in order to get into a sold-out concert.
episodes.title: Cheer Up, Candace / Fireside Girl Jamboree

episodes.synopsis: After Baljeet saves his life, Buford pledges to become Baljeet's servant. / Phineas and Ferb help Candace hunt down a lost doll.
episodes.title: The Bully Code / Finding Mary McGuffin

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb have fun with a teleportation device. / Phineas and Ferb help Jeremy become a great dancer for a TV dance show.
episodes.title: Picture This / Nerdy Dancin'

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb reverse engineer a mysterious invention to figure out what it does. / Phineas and Ferb set out to find the lost city of Atlantis.
episodes.title: What Do It Do? / Atlantis

episodes.synopsis: With Christmas just around the corner, Doofenshmirtz activates his "Naughty-inator," and all of Danville appears to have turned naughty.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb Christmas Vacation!

episodes.synopsis: The boys invent a device to let them pass through objects. / The boys' outrageous decorations threaten to ruin Candace's big day as a bridesmaid.
episodes.title: Just Passing Through / Candace's Big Day

episodes.synopsis: Candace enters a father-daughter race with a Lawrence robot. / Candace's mortal enemy, Little Suzy, helps her bust the boys.
episodes.title: I Was a Middle-Aged Robot / Suddenly Suzy

episodes.synopsis: Carl goes undercover to stop Phineas and Ferb's shenanigans. / Phineas and Ferb create the ultimate floats for the Tri-State Area Parade.
episodes.title: Undercover Carl / Hip Hip Parade

episodes.synopsis: Candace believes Ferb has been abducted and replaced by an alien. / Phineas and Ferb soup up a kiddie ride outside the local Tri-State Mart.
episodes.title: Invasion of the Ferb Snatchers / Ain't No Kiddie Ride

episodes.synopsis: Baljeet and Buford pose as Phineas and Ferb to impress Irving's older brother. / Candace puts together a team of busters to bust her brothers.
episodes.title: Not Phineas and Ferb / Phineas and Ferb-Busters!

episodes.synopsis: Ferb befriends a chameleon that grows to gigantic proportions. / Candace tries to show how responsible she is while busting the boys' robotic rodeo.
episodes.title: The Lizard Whisperer / Robot Rodeo

episodes.synopsis: Isabella investigates to find the true identity of a metallic superhero that is rescuing people left and right.
episodes.title: The Beak: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Candace becomes an honorary mayor and uses her powers to try to bust the boys. / Phineas and Ferb create a lemonade stand empire throughout Danville.
episodes.title: She's the Mayor / The Lemonade Stand

episodes.synopsis: Candace decides to take a vacation from busting, unaware that Phineas and Ferb are growing giant sea monkeys that they can romp and play with.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb Hawaiian Vacation: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb plan to travel around the world in one day. Meanwhile, Candace wonders if she should go along with the boys to visit Jeremy in Paris.
episodes.title: Summer Belongs to You!

episodes.synopsis: At the annual science fiction/comic book convention, Phineas and Ferb are swept up into the duel between the fantasy fans and the sci-fi fans.
episodes.title: Nerds of a Feather: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb spin the house in order to paint it more quickly; Candace -- who's inside the house -- wakes up in the magical land of Odd.
episodes.title: Wizard of Odd: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb create a human-sized maze filled with obstacles. / Dad enlists the boys' help to turn him into a pop star.
episodes.title: We Call It Maze / Ladies and Gentlemen, Meet Max Modem!

episodes.synopsis: Candace takes a class to learn how to achieve her goal: busting the boys. / Candace teams up with Irving's brother to try to bust her brothers.
episodes.title: The Secret of Success / The Doof Side of the Moon

episodes.synopsis: A Phineas and Ferb device splits Candace into two Candaces. / Phineas and Ferb create a sick-day triathlon that they can play from their beds.
episodes.title: Split Personality / Brain Drain

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb relive their first day of summer as a musical!
episodes.title: Rollercoaster: The Musical!

episodes.synopsis: Candace and a princess switch places to get a taste of each others' lives. / Candace's small get-together grows into a huge party.
episodes.title: Make Play / Candace Gets Busted

episodes.synopsis: The boys create a biodome so Isabella can earn a Fireside Girl patch, despite the rain. / Doofenshmirtz's Combine-inator joins Candace and Jeremy.
episodes.title: The Great Indoors / Canderemy

episodes.synopsis: Candace uses boots the boys invented to be in two places at once. / While visiting their grandparents, the kids create giant hot-air racing balloons.
episodes.title: Run, Candace, Run / Last Train to Bustville

episodes.synopsis: For Phineas's birthday, Ferb and the gang create a clip show. / In another part of town, Perry must stop Doofenshmirtz from using his TV-non-inator.
episodes.title: Phineas's Birthday Clip-O-Rama!

episodes.synopsis: At the Harbor Days Festival, Phineas and Ferb make a mechanical version of the Danville Harbor shark. / The boys decide to take some cows to the moon.
episodes.title: The Belly of the Beast / Moon Farm

episodes.synopsis: The boys invent a supercomputer to answer their questions, but Candace has other ideas. / Perry goes missing from his 100th battle with Doofenshmirtz.
episodes.title: Ask a Foolish Question / Misperceived Monotreme

episodes.synopsis: When Candace loses her phone, she asks Phineas and Ferb for help. / The boys decide to create a magic carpet to fly around Danville.
episodes.title: Candace Disconnected / Magic Carpet Ride

episodes.synopsis: Candace gives herself a bad haircut. / It's a busy day in Danville, and the gang is trying to make the most of it.
episodes.title: Bad Hair Day / Meatloaf Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Mom wants to spend the whole day with Candace. / Doofenshmirtz thinks Vanessa overhears him saying he'd rather have a son to do his evil bidding.
episodes.title: Phineas & Ferb Interrupted / A Real Boy

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb build a truck-stop diner on top of the RV. / When Candace is stuck in bed, Phineas and Ferb try to keep her from getting bored.
episodes.title: Road Trip / Mommy Can You Hear Me?

episodes.synopsis: The kids build a giant version of their favorite childhood game. / Baljeet confesses that he is descended from a long line of bicycle race losers.
episodes.title: Skiddley Whiffers / Tour de Ferb

episodes.synopsis: When Ferb's English cousins visit, they challenge him to a game of soccer, but he and Phineas turn the ordinary football game into super Football X-7.
episodes.title: My Fair Goalie

episodes.synopsis: After seeing a horror movie, Candace is sure she's becoming a vampire. / On Halloween the kids meet a strange boy who's certain his house is haunted.
episodes.title: That's the Spirit / The Curse of Candace

episodes.synopsis: The boys decide to create their own language. / Nana's Latke Festival may be ruined when Isabella finds that all the potatoes in Danville are missing.
episodes.title: Ferb Latin / Lotsa Latkes

episodes.synopsis: Trying to keep cool during the summer heat, the boys put on a traditional Christmas special with friends and family, plus a few very special guests.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb's Family Christmas Special

episodes.synopsis: In the stone age, the boys decide to invent the wheel. / In feudal China, Phineas and Ferb see Doofus Khan take the Princess Isabella hostage.
episodes.title: Tri-Stone Area / Doof Dynasty

episodes.synopsis: In this story of Medieval fantasy and adventure, Phineas and Ferb-a-Lot set out on a quest for the legendary sword, Excaliferb.
episodes.title: Excaliferb

episodes.synopsis: After losing a gift that Jeremy made for her, Candace is determined to recreate it. / Phineas and Ferb infiltrate a massive ant farm.
episodes.title: Monster from Id / Gi-Ants

episodes.synopsis: The boys have fun with an escape tower, until it becomes self aware. / Phineas and Ferb create Cheesetopia, and Doofenshmirtz uses the Butler-inator.
episodes.title: Escape from Phineas Tower / The Remains of the Platypus

episodes.synopsis: Perry wins a contest and becomes the spokesanimal for Totally Tools. / Lawrence participates in the L.O.V.E.M.U.F.F.I.N. Pageant of Evil.
episodes.title: Perry the Actorpus / Bullseye!

episodes.synopsis: When Mom asks the kids to be quiet, Phineas and Ferb created ninja outfits. / Buford accepts a proposal to help win over the Tri-State Area.
episodes.title: Quietest Day Ever / Bully Bromance Breakup

episodes.synopsis: The boys are embarking on their day's project when suddenly they are attacked by an alien robot!
episodes.title: Meapless in Seattle

episodes.synopsis: Paul the Delivery Man journeys to Phineas & Ferb's house and Doofenshmirtz Evil Inc. / Phineas thinks it would be fun to suspend trampolines.
episodes.title: Delivery of Destiny / Let's Bounce

episodes.synopsis: Mom is out of Doonkelberries for her pie, so the boys set out to find some. / Visitors from France help Isabella capture the American grizzly bear.
episodes.title: The Doonkleberry Imperative / Buford Confidential

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb ask Candace what she wants to do today. / The boys invent a cerebral stimulatory hat to help Baljeet.
episodes.title: The Mom Attractor / Cranius Maximus

episodes.synopsis: Doof shows up at OWCA claiming to have had an epiphany. / Ohio Flynn and Rhode Island Fletcher set off to South America to help a damsel in distress.
episodes.title: Agent Doof / Phineas and Ferb and the Temple of Juatchadoon

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb invent a new game: jet-pack volleyball. / Phineas and Ferb create a flying saucer to help solve the mystery of crop circles.
episodes.title: Sleep Walk Surprise / Sci-Fi Pie Fly

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb create a Perry that can go anywhere and do everything. / Phineas and Ferb invent a world full of giant leaf piles and gourds.
episodes.title: Mom's in the House / Minor Monogram

episodes.synopsis: Doof's daughter, Vanessa, and Major Monogram's son, Monty, go out for coffee together.
episodes.title: Sipping with the Enemy / Tri-State Treasure: Boot of Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Doof turns himself into a platypus to defeat Perry, but finds it's harder than he imagined.
episodes.title: Doofapus / Norm Unleashed

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb go on safari while Perry stays behind to protect Danville from a new evil.
episodes.title: Where's Perry?: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While Phineas and Ferb are on safari, Perry appears with evil Carl, Monogram and Doof in tow!
episodes.title: Where's Perry?: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The boys learn that animal celebrity, Crikey the Crocodile, has gone missing.
episodes.title: What a Croc! / Ferb TV

episodes.synopsis: Phineas and Ferb discover that a strange planet is hurtling directly toward Earth.
episodes.title: When Worlds Collide / Road to Danville

episodes.synopsis: Norm is the host of an odd reality show that looks back at the eventful life of Dr. Doofenshmirtz.
episodes.title: This Is Your Back Story

episodes.synopsis: Candace is put in charge of the boys right before the entire city loses electricity.
episodes.title: Black Out / What'd I Miss?

episodes.synopsis: National Hockey League star Luc Robitaille offers his assistance when Phineas and Ferb take an ice hockey game to the extreme. Meanwhile, Doofenshmirtz build an Abominable-inator to make himself bigger, scarier and hairer.
episodes.title: For Your Ice Only / Happy New Year!

episodes.synopsis: Agent P teams up with a former partner, a human agent named Lyla, to stop a hijacked train running along the US/Canadian border.
episodes.title: Sidetracked

episodes.synopsis: Perry must escape Liam, an Australian platypus hunter who is out to destroy him, rescue ongoing foe Dr. Doofenshmirtz from the error of his ways and maintain the sanctity of the Danville Botanical Gardens.
episodes.title: Primal Perry

episodes.synopsis: Buford removes a part from a tire swing the boys are building and it accidentally shoots a ray that turns Candace into a fly. Meanwhile, Doofenshmirtz is suffering from evil scientist's block.
episodes.title: Fly on the Wall / My Sweet Ride

episodes.synopsis: After Mom reminisces about old times, the boys make a giant inflatable wading pool. Meanwhile, Candace reveals her "Emo" side, and Doofenshmirtz attempts to become ruler of all bees.
episodes.title: Bee Day / Bee Story

episodes.synopsis: Candace challenges Buford to keep Phineas and Ferb's invention from disappearing so that she can sweep in and casually bust her brothers. Across town, Doofenshmirtz has had one too many lattes and is experiencing an extra burst of evil energy.
episodes.title: Bully Bust / Backyard Hodge Podge

episodes.synopsis: When Candace thinks Jeremy is bored with their usual hangouts, she sets out to find something unique to do with him.
episodes.title: Great Balls of Water / Where's Pinky?

episodes.synopsis: The boys create Rutabaga-themed vehicles when Candace is chosen to be Rutabaga princess and gets to start the "Running of the Chinchillas.
episodes.title: Der Kinderlumper / Just Desserts

episodes.synopsis: The boys set out to prove the existence of the elusive Chupacabra to the world, but Candace can't stand the wait and needs to first just prove it to Mom.
episodes.title: La Candace-Cabra! / Happy Birthday, Isabella!

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man, Iron Man, Thor and Hulk stand powerless after being struck by Dr. Doofenshmirtz's power-draining "inator." Once the Marvel Super Villains - Red Skull, Whiplash, Venom and M.O.D.O.K. - find out that Dr.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb: Mission Marvel, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Spider-Man, Iron Man, Thor and Hulk stand powerless after being struck by Dr. Doofenshmirtz's power-draining "inator." Once the Marvel Super Villains - Red Skull, Whiplash, Venom and M.O.D.O.K. - find out that Dr.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb: Mission Marvel, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Linda becomes overwhelmed for organizing a block party, she asks Phineas and Ferb for help. Meanwhile, Norm falls in love with Rodney's female robot.
episodes.title: Love at First Byte / One Good Turn

episodes.synopsis: This new episode of "Phineas and Ferb" features three separate tales. Tale One follows Candace as she accidentally conjures up a spell that turns her Ducky Momo plushie into a living, breathing doll that is set on stalking her.
episodes.title: Terrifying Tri-state Trilogy of Terror

episodes.synopsis: After learning about Monty and Vanessa's secret relationship, Carl bribes Monty into helping him get some much needed acknowledgement from Monogram.
episodes.title: Thanks But No Thanks / Troy Story

episodes.synopsis: When Vanessa learns that Doofenshmirtz has inherited a Drusselsteinian castle right next door to her she seizes the opportunity to throw the biggest Halloween bash ever.
episodes.title: Druselsteinoween / Face Your Fear

episodes.synopsis: The boys ask Candace to get Mom if they get stuck in their gigantic reproduction of the Gordian knot. / The gang switches bodies with alien tourists.
episodes.title: Knot My Problem / Mind Share

episodes.synopsis: With Stacy's advice, Candace asks Phineas and Ferb to create an over sized book of her special events with Jeremy for his birthday.
episodes.title: Cheers For Fears / Just Our Luck

episodes.synopsis: While Phineas and Ferb work to stage a big summer concert, Doofenshmirtz is messing with the rotation of Earth, threatening summer's arrival.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb Save Summer, Part I

episodes.synopsis: While Phineas and Ferb work to stage a big summer concert, Doofenshmirtz is messing with the rotation of Earth, threatening summer's arrival.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb Save Summer, Part II

episodes.synopsis: Doof concocts a new item called a "back-to-the-store-inator"; Phineas and Ferb invent a device that enhances the wind, and tests it with kites.
episodes.title: Return Policy / Imperfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: An episode centered on Klimpaloon, the magical old-timey bathing suit that lives in the Himalayas.
episodes.title: The Klimpaloon Ultimatum

episodes.synopsis: Doof helps Perry's enemy, Dennis the Bunny, escape incarceration; Agent P tries to stop Doof from sabotaging and winning a big car race.
episodes.title: The Return of the Rogue Rabbit / Live and Let Drive

episodes.synopsis: Isabella writes a letter to Phineas to say how she feels about him, but she decides she doesn't want him to read it and tries to get it back.
episodes.title: Operation Crumb Cake / Mandace

episodes.synopsis: A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away in summer, Phineas and Ferb are living happily on Tatooine, just one moisture farm over from Luke Skywalker.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb Star Wars, Part I

episodes.synopsis: A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away in summer, Phineas and Ferb are living happily on Tatooine, just one moisture farm over from Luke Skywalker.
episodes.title: Phineas and Ferb Star Wars, Part II

episodes.synopsis: Flashback: at the 1903 World's Fair, kids are excited about the unveiling of steam-driven machines; Isabella plans a picnic for Phineas.
episodes.title: Steampunx / It's No Picnic

episodes.synopsis: A capsule falls from the sky and lands right in Phineas and Ferb's yard; Doof gives a seminar, while Phineas and Ferb hold an interplanetary race.
episodes.title: Lost in Danville / The Inator Method

episodes.synopsis: Doof accidentally turns everyone in Danville into zombies, who wreak havoc in the town.
episodes.title: Night of the Living Pharmacists, Part I

episodes.synopsis: Agent P and the kids try to avoid joining the legion of the undead while saving Danville from being overrun by Doof-zombies.
episodes.title: Night of the Living Pharmacists, Part II

episodes.synopsis: After defeating the alternate Doofenshmirtz, Phineas, Ferb and Candace work together to defeat a new threat to the 2nd Dimension.
episodes.title: Tales from the Resistance

episodes.synopsis: Doof is forced to become a science teacher at Danville High as punishment for being evil; Doof tries to track down a meaningful lawn gnome.
episodes.title: Doof 101 / Father's Day

episodes.synopsis: As Phineas tries to decide where he wants to go to college, he learns something that makes him want to talk to Isabella before she leaves for college.
episodes.title: Act Your Age

episodes.synopsis: As Phineas and Ferb get to work on their most epic invention yet, Candace's efforts to bust them send the day spiraling out of control.
episodes.title: Last Day of Summer, Part I

episodes.synopsis: With Phineas and Ferb stuck in a void, Candace races to stop the ever-shortening time loops and Dr. Doofenshmirtz has a sudden change of heart.
episodes.title: Last Day of Summer, Part II

episodes.synopsis: After an attack on O.W.C.A. (Organization Without a Cool Acronym), Agent P teams up with his old nemesis to find a supervillain's lair.
episodes.title: The O.W.C.A. Files, Part I

episodes.synopsis: As robotic fleas turn the agents of O.W.C.A. evil, Dr. Doofenshmirtz tries to rescue Perry and Professor Parenthesis reveals his wicked plan.
episodes.title: The O.W.C.A. Files, Part II
